search_results.title: Tom O'Bedlam
search_results.snippet: Tom O'Bedlam is the author of Trickster's Song. His writing is a madcap mixture of bad jokes, obscure references, and music of all kinds.

search_results.title: Tom o' Bedlam
search_results.snippet: "Tom o' Bedlam" is the title of an anonymous poem in the "mad song" genre, written in the voice of a homeless "Bedlamite". The poem was probably composed at ...
